segments.text: I can’t believe the children are getting cookies when the woman has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little heist feels so mischievous, yet I can’t help but find it somewhat charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s outstretched hand signifies her anticipation for the cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what if the boy loses his balance? I shudder at the thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a thrill in their secretive act, yet the risks loom large.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch as the boy’s fingers brush against the jar, filled with cookies just begging to be taken.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think about how these little moments are both innocent and perilous.
segments.speaker: PAR
